text: Jim Parsons is an American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.183-8. He drove a 1927 Ford dubbed The High and Mighty;Davis, p.187. in 1963, it was powered by a Dodge V8, in 1966 by a Chrysler.Davis, pp.183-4. Parsons won the NHRA A/SR (A Street) national title twice, in 1963 and 1966. He won at the 1963 NHRA Nationals, held at Indianapolis Raceway Park, with a pass of 12.17 seconds at .Davis, p.183. In 1966, won at the NHRA Nationals, again at Indianapolis, with a pass of 10.16 seconds at .Davis, p.185. ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp.180-8. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Jim Parsons (drag racer)
